name: Cyphronis - TOJam12 Edition
description:
Created for #TOJam 2017: What Twelves Below..

Objective:

Collect the Nodes to [Complete Sequence]..

Stay Tuned for Upcoming Updates..

(More Levels, More Features, More Player Options, More Soundtracks..)

Controls:

WSAD or Cursor/Arrow Keys - Up, Down, Left, Right

Enter or Click [Play] - To start..

R - Restart.. (Respawn to Main Screen)

Alt+F4 to Quit
